story.storykicker: Manipur Police has released notification inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the posts of Constable, Rifleman, Follower. The candidates may send the application in a prescribed format as per notification on or before June 1.
story.storybody:
Manipur Police has released notification inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the posts of Constable, Rifleman, Follower. The candidates may send the application in a prescribed format as per notification on or before June 1.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 3057

Name of the posts:

  • Police Constable: 2052
  • Rifleman: 441
  • Follower: 564

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

The candidates must hold Secondary/ Senior Secondary certificate from a recognised board or university.

Age limit:

For the post wise various age limit details, please check the notification. However, the reserved category candidates need to apply in accordance with the government order.

Selection process:

The candidates will be selected on the basis of a written examination or an interview.

How to apply:

The candidates need to download the application form from the official website, www.manipurpolice.org and needs to send the application in the prescribed format to the following address as per notification.

Important date:

The last date to send the application is June 1.
